                             char enemy)
        Verifies if the Ogre has an enemy in his surrounding positions.
        Parameters:
        b - Board where the enemy will be looked for.
        enemy - char data type that represents the enemy to be looked for.
        Returns:
        True if the enemy is in the Hero surroundings, False otherwise.
